content: this pattern is from tejiendo perú the original pattern is in spanish but they have given me permission to translate the pattern to english and post it on my blog my translation is written using us crochet terms you can find the original spanish pattern and photos here bolero mariposa 1 they also have a youtube video in spanish here youtube bolero mariposa 2 1 https //www tejiendoperu com/crochet/crochet-para-ni%c3%b1os/bolero-mariposa-para-bebes-y-ni%c3%b1as/ 2 https //youtu be/bn9qn6hlucg
